ing: 1 (7 ounce) can salmon, drained, bones and skin removed
des: "One of my favorite recipes!  I have had many ask for this recipe.  It is always one of the first things gone when I bring it to a barbeque."
ins: In a medium bowl, combine the cream cheese, sour cream, butter, pimentos, parsley and onion; beat with an electric mixer until smooth. Stir in the salmon and dill. Cover and refrigerate until serving.
